long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2-Breads is a 
* Better WebPage Reader.
* Knowledge Fragments Collector
* Advanced Bookmark Manager

2-Breads provides:

* Highlight Tool: to highlight any text in webpages. The 'highlights' will keep there until you remove them.
  With Highlight Tool, you can highlight the 'important'/'meaningful'... contents of a webpage, and anytime you reopen these pages, you can quickly get these points because the 'highlights' will keep there.

* (in-page) Bookmark Tool: to bookmark any text in webpages. These bookmarks are organized in 'Tree' hierarchy and you reorganize them as you want.
  With (in-page) Bookmark Tool, anytime you click them, you will be guided directly to the text bookmarked. and
  You are able to well re-organize the knowledge fragments you collected when you scan pages by putting the linked fragments into the same group.

* Annotation Tool: to annotate any text in webpages
  With Annotation Tool, you can put you comments just beside the text you want to comment. and anytime you reopen these webpages, you can recall these comments.
